content.text: Annie, Ben and Caili shared some money. The ratio of Annie's money to Ben's money was $4 : 1$. Caili received $84 and she had $24 more than Annie. How much money did Ben receive?
content.text_latex: Annie, Ben and Caili shared some money. The ratio of Annie's money to Ben's money was $4 : 1$. Caili received $84 and she had $24 more than Annie. How much money did Ben receive?
